title: [Large-Scale] Development Process of Simulation/VR-Based Mathematics Educational Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and problem-solving skills for everyday life
context.additional_context: Concurrent foundational education to improve learners' digital device utilization skills

learning_goals: Learners can develop one mathematics simulation content piece by applying the systematic instructional design model (ADDIE).
Learners can design three mathematical problem-solving scenarios in a VR environment and conduct implementation evaluations.
Learners can design and operate a summative assessment tool based on pre- and post-tests for analyzing educational effectiveness.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
